Start time : 10/01/2022 21:00 UTC End time : 11/01/2022 03:00 UTC Service impact : No impact is expected Service improvement : As Cisco 6500 devices are reaching end-of-life, we are migrating services to newly N9348 platforms for reliability and vendor support.

According to our lifecycle management, we are upgrading some top of rack switches:
fra1-lim1-sdtor146a-n93

fra1-lim1-sdtor151a-n93
gra2-sdtor638a-n93
rbx7-sdtor353a-n93

An impact of 5 minutes per switch is expected on the public traffic
Maintenance will occur on 11 january 2022 from 2:30am to 4:00am

scheduled_maintenances.name: [BHS5/BHS8/SGP1/RBX7/RBX8][Network] - Core Mgmt AGG - Update Cisco campaign 11th January

incident_updates.body: Start time : 11/01/2022 08:00 UTC End time : 12/01/2022 02:00 UTC Service impact : No impact is expected Service improvement : We need to update the DC core switches to newer version 7.0.3.I7.9 for reliability and vendor support. BHS5/BHS8: 8:00-11:00 UTC SGP1: 14:00-18:00 UTC RBX7/RBX8: 21:00-02:00 UTC

Due to an imponderable, we postpone the intervention to 11/01/2022 between 10:00 UTC and 12:00 UTC.
We apologize for the inconvenience caused
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 10/01/2022 10:00 UTC End time : 10/01/2022 12:00 UTC Service impact : During the replacement of the affected switch, all customers connected on this device will lose connectivity with their public interface. Loss of connectivity will occur frequently during the operation. We apologise for any inconvenience caused. Service improvement : The purpose of this maintenance will be to replace a switch that had been installed temporarily, while the same model as the original is received.

According to our lifecycle management, we are upgrading some top of rack switches:
rbx7-sdtor283ab-n93
rbx7-sdtor323ab-n93
rbx7-sdtor316ab-n93
rbx7-sdtor361ab-n93
fra1-lim1-sdtor165ab-n93
gra2-sdtor503ab-n93
gra2-sdtor516ab-n93
lon1-eri1-sdtor136ab-n93
rbx7-sdtor163ab-n93
waw1-sdtor166ab-n93

Some configuration have to be done before and after the upgrade. An impact of 30 seconds per switch on the vrack is exepected and an impact (packets losses) of 1h30 between hosts on the same switch is expected
Maintenance will occur on 11 january 2022 from 12:30am to 3:30am

Start time : 12/01/2021 05:00 UTC End time : 12/01/2021 13:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We have to switch to the new SMAUG architecture because the old Thorn architecture no longer supports the traffic we have on this site. This change is for the transfer of peering from nwk-1 to nyc-ny1-pb1-8k.

We need to standardize the configuration of the core of BHS.
No impact expected during the maintenance.

The maintenance will be performed on Wednesday 01 Decembrer between 5:00AM and 7:00AM UTC.

Start time : 12/01/2021 05:00 UTC End time : 12/01/2021 13:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We have to switch to the new SMAUG architecture because the old Thorn architecture no longer supports the traffic we have on this site. This change is for transfer of peering from nwk-5 to nyc-ny1-pb2-8k.
